name: Cover Yourself In Blood (NecroCat version)
description:
NecroCatic Games and JordanCup ( JordanCup - itch.io ) have teamed up to do a special collaboration of "Cover Yourself in Blood : NecroCat edition". This is the SAME "Cover Yourself In Blood" that you know and love but reskinned with our cat!!!

Now you can enjoy this classic in your browser OR download it here or head over to JordanCup's page and get the original!!!

Barry of NecroCatic Games calls this the "Slip and Slide Simulator 5000". 

WHAT IS YOUR HIGHEST SCORE?!

NecroCaticGames - "Love it to Death!"
